snippet: They kicked, pushed and punched one of the harassers so aggressively that another man on the bus had to come to his aid, although no one aided the sisters.
lead_paragraph: They kicked, pushed and punched one of the harassers so aggressively that another man on the bus had to come to his aid, although no one aided the sisters.

headline.main: Harassed on a Bus in India, Sisters Lash Out and Video Goes Viral
